Package org.ejbca.ui.web.admin.administratorprivileges

Class AccessRulesBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.ui.web.admin.BaseManagedBean
      • org.ejbca.ui.web.admin.administratorprivileges.AccessRulesBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class AccessRulesBean
extends BaseManagedBean
implements Serializable
    Managed Bean for the Role's access rules pages: - Basic mode access rule configuration - Advanced mode access rule configuration - Advanced mode access rule summary
    Version:
    $Id: AccessRulesBean.java 29919 2018-09-28 10:44:43Z samuellb $ TODO: Use CDI beans
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
